user.title: Connect to Trimlight
user.description:
Enter your Trimlight API credentials.

Client ID is the login you use to log in to the app.
Client Secret is provided by Trimlight.
Device ID identifies your Trimlight controller (use the TrimlightEdgeControl scripts to discover it).

init.title: Trimlight options
init.description: When enabled, selecting a custom preset will also run the saved preset by id in the background.
